name: Fix It! - Global Game Jam 2020
description:
Controls:
A and D to move left and right (you can also use the arrows)

----------------------------------------

My first game, made during the 2020 Global Game Jam.
https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/fix-it-0-1

In Fix It!!!, you must reach your trusty wrench so you can make some much needed repairs. 
Will you make a bigger mess than you intend to repair?
(I have to admit, wrecking stuff is just as fun as trying to make a clean run)

An incredibly short experience, I hope you have as much fun playing it as I did making it.

----------------------------------------

Credits:

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)

Heavily influenced by Brackeys
https://www.youtube.com/user/Brackeys
I thoroughly appreciate  and recommend the tutorials from Brackeys.

I hope you enjoy it!
